name: Skyward Blade
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytext:
The sky-piercing fang. With nemesis vanquished, the wind dragon fell into a deep slumber.
Centuries passed, and Dvalin's sacrifice was all but forgotten by Mondstadt.
A prayer, this sword is. May Dvalin's name be restored.
